content.query:
/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT [SchoolYear]
      ,[OrganizationLevel]
      ,[County]
      ,[ESDName]
      ,[ESDOrganizationID]
      ,[DistrictOrganizationId]
      ,[SchoolCode]
      ,[SchoolOrganizationid]
      ,[CurrentSchoolType]
      ,[StudentGroupType]
      ,[StudentGroup]
      ,[GradeLevel]
      ,[TestAdministration]
      ,[TestSubject]
      ,[Suppression]
      ,[Count of Students Expected to Test]
      ,[CountMetStandard]
      ,[CountofStudentsExpectedtoTest(including previously passed)]
      ,[PercentMetStandard]
      ,[DataAsOf]
	  ,coalesce([School Name], [SchoolName]) as [SchoolName]
	  ,coalesce([Local District Code], case when len([DistrictCode])<5 
		then '0' + [DistrictCode]
		else [DistrictCode] 
		end) as [DistrictCode],
		coalesce([Local District], [DistrictName]) as [DistrictName]
into transform.AcademicPerformance
  FROM [staging].[AcademicPerformance] a
  left join [staging].[CharterSchoolDirectory] b 
  on a.[SchoolCode] = b.[School Code]
